# TimeSpanExtensions.ToShortFormat method

Converts a TimeSpan object into dd'd' HH'h' MM'm' ss's' or HH'h' MM'm' ss's' or MM'm' ss's' string.

```csharp
public static string ToShortFormat(this TimeSpan target)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| target | Target timeSpan. |

## Return Value

A String that contains the expected format.
